Uses of Package
oracle.ucp.admin

  • Packages that use oracle.ucp.admin 
    Package Description
    oracle.ucp
    Includes both required and optional callback interfaces that are used to implement connection pool features.
    oracle.ucp.admin
    Defines interfaces for administering Universal Connection Pool instances, including JMX support.
    oracle.ucp.jdbc
    Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool.
  • Classes in oracle.ucp.admin used by oracle.ucp 
    Class and Description
    UniversalConnectionPoolMBean
    The Universal Connection Pool MBean defines operations and attributes for managing the Universal Connection Pool.
  • Classes in oracle.ucp.admin used by oracle.ucp.admin 
    Class and Description
    UniversalConnectionPoolManager
    The UniversalConnectionPoolManager interface defines operations for creating and maintaining the Universal Connection Pool instances.
    UniversalConnectionPoolMBean
    The Universal Connection Pool MBean defines operations and attributes for managing the Universal Connection Pool.
  • Classes in oracle.ucp.admin used by oracle.ucp.jdbc 
    Class and Description
    UniversalConnectionPoolMBean
    The Universal Connection Pool MBean defines operations and attributes for managing the Universal Connection Pool.
